channel.title: (Work Shop) if you need help come here =)
channel.description:
Ok, i have been studying java for a we bit long time, and i think im ready to help the public.
I am best at helping you with compile errors and adding shops, npc's , quests, specs, and other things that i cant remember.
-so ill try my best to help you out with any help that you need.
your senior member, tele

item.title: (Work Shop) if you need help come here =)
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,34457.0.html
thats my error[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 11:30:45 PM[/size][hr][quote=“volkasenne, post:5, topic:22386”]Hi, my problem is that i can’t give monsters hp, each time i change the second colum of the npc.cfg and save it, nothing happens!!! Some people are telling me to click on the compile bat, but wich one?? Could any1 with some expirience explain me please, i’ll be very thankfull, i’ve been having this problem 2 days and still can’t solve it…[/quote]

Ok make 2nd column save it then close it (npc.cfg) then find the exact words: “compile” it should show a cog. Dont do “runserver” or “run” or any of the combinations…wait for some words and if any where in the compiler there’s any errors post em here. then close compile and run server.

Read full topic
item.source: (Work Shop) if you need help come here =)

item.title: (Work Shop) if you need help come here =)
item.dc:creator: @Darth1Revan Darth1Revan
item.description:
@Darth1Revan wrote:

Burt:

um hello i aws working on somthing but it didnt work so i deleted it and now when people get on my server they automaticly log out but when u switch my client java to a plain testscape sourceits oaky

Ive had the same thing happen to me, there could be a 2 problems that i know of, you may not have fast enough internet, um… u may have too much on your server ( this how i fixed my problem, i removed a few things i didnt need, that i had added earlier )

Read full topic

item.description:
@volkasenne wrote:

Hi, my problem is that i can’t give monsters hp, each time i change the second colum of the npc.cfg and save it, nothing happens!!! Some people are telling me to click on the compile bat, but wich one?? Could any1 with some expirience explain me please, i’ll be very thankfull, i’ve been having this problem 2 days and still can’t solve it…

item.title: (Work Shop) if you need help come here =)
item.dc:creator: @seanoc123 seanoc123
item.description:
@seanoc123 wrote:

rofl I got a massive error off somehting I didn’t even touch lol

[code]NPCHandler.java:284: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:356: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPCID)

           ^

NPCHandler.java:650: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public static int worldmap2[][] = {
^
NPCHandler.java:659: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn’t remove - xerozcheez

   ^

NPCHandler.java:660: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2};
^
NPCHandler.java:662: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public static int randomremoveschaos()
^
NPCHandler.java:1000: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
}
^
NPCHandler.java:1000: ‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
}
^
8 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Idk what’s wrong lol :S
